description: C# controller class 'AuthController' for handling authentication-related endpoints such as user registration and login in an ASP.NET Core web API project.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: Controller class managing authentication endpoints: register and login.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Handles user registration by accepting registration data and creating a new user. Returns user info on success or bad request on failure.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: Handles user login, authenticates credentials, and returns a JWT token or unauthorized error.
